text: Mahipalpur is an urban village, located in South Delhi, India. It is located near by the Indira Gandhi International Airport. Delhi Aerocity metro station is the nearest metro station. == History == The village dates back to the 14th century, and is named after a Tomar ruler named Mahipal. The area around the village has been inhabited since earlier. For example, the Sultan Ghari monument was built in 1231. == See also == * Vasant Kunj * Delhi Aerocity metro station == References == Category:South West Delhi district Category:Villages in South Delhi district Category:Neighbourhoods in Delhi
title: Mahipalpur
